subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Melanie Oudin, Shenay Perry, Bethanie Mattek-Sands and the doubles player Liezel Huber are on the United States team that will play at France in the Fed Cup quarterfinals on Feb. 6-7. Serena Williams said she and her sister Venus would be at the Super Bowl in suburban Miami that weekend because they are part-owners of the Miami Dolphins.
